Package ibo1.Utility

Class PopUpMessages

java.lang.Object
ibo1.Utility.PopUpMessages
public abstract class PopUpMessages extends Object
AlertMessage - Class that allows to show information or warnings to the user when exceptions occur or warnings are shown. This class uses JFX to display information outside the nominal usage of the user interface.

Implements multiple methods to handle exception and alert messages shown to the user. Further, implements a choice box version to pick from different choices

Version:
0.1 ( Initial development )., 1.0 ( Initial release ).
Author:
Omar Ibrahim

    • createAndShowAlert

      private static void createAndShowAlert(String titleString, String headerString, String contentString, boolean onlyOkayButton, javafx.scene.control.Alert.AlertType alertType)
      Creates an alert where you can define title, header, content and choosing it to only have an okay button and setting the alert Type.
      Parameters:
      titleString - Title of the alert
      headerString - Header of the alert
      contentString - Content of the alert
      onlyOkayButton - Set need for okay button
      alertType - Type of alert of type Alert.AlertType

    • createAndShowChoiceDialog

      private static String createAndShowChoiceDialog(String titleString, String headerString, String contentString, List<String> choices)
      Creates and shows a choice dialog.

      Waits for the selection of a choice and returns that choice.

      Parameters:
      titleString - Title text of the choice dialog
      headerString - Header text of the choice dialog
      contentString - Content text of the choice dialog
      choices - Choices of the ChoiceDialog of type List of String
      Returns:
      returns the selected choice as String

    • showChoiceDialogChessEngine

      public static String showChoiceDialogChessEngine(List<String> choices)
      Creates a choice dialog for chess engines.

      This is used to select which chess engine will be used.

      Parameters:
      choices - Possible chess engines as String
      Returns:
      the selected chess engine
